info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 15 at 3:02AM EST until December 17 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulation of 4 to 10 inches with locally higher totals around a foot at the highest elevations of the southern Berkshires. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Northern Litchfield County. In Massachusetts, Southern Berkshire County. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. The hazardous conditions are expected to impact the morning and evening commute on Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall amounts will vary by elevation. Best chance for 7 or more inches will be at locations above 1000 feet in elevation. Snowfall rates may reach one inch per hour at times, especially early Friday morning and again on Friday late afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
